entry.string: The LogConfig Module controls the Xaraya logging system.
entry.translation: Zee LugCunffeeg Mudoole-a cuntruls zee Xereya luggeeng system.

entry.string: From the menu, you have three choices.
entry.translation: Frum zee menoo, yuoo hefe-a three-a chueeces. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Add logger -- Allows you add a new logger to the configuration.
entry.translation: Edd lugger -- Elloos yuoo edd a noo lugger tu zee cunffeegooreshun.

entry.string: List loggers -- List the loggers that are currently configured.
entry.translation: Leest luggers -- Leest zee luggers thet ere-a coorrently cunffeegoored. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Turn logging on/off -- Makes Xaraya log according to the loggers configured or not.
entry.translation: Toorn luggeeng oon/ooffff -- Mekes Xereya lug eccurdeeng tu zee luggers cunffeegoored oor nut. Um de hur de hur de hur.

entry.string: If the logging is set to off in this module (if this module is not active, it turns off logging automatically) and there is no logging configuration in config.system.php (old configuration style) then there is a fallback system that will log to var/logs/log.txt whenever it is present .
entry.translation: Iff zee luggeeng is set tu ooffff in thees mudoole-a (iff thees mudoole-a is nut ecteefe-a, it toorns ooffff luggeeng ootumeteecelly) und zeere-a is nu luggeeng cunffeegooreshun in config.system.php (oold cunffeegooreshun style-a) zeen zeere-a is a fellbeck system thet veell lug tu var/logs/log.txt vhenefer it is present .
